core.Chainable

    • Uses of Chainable in core

      Methods in core with annotations of type Chainable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.alignHandles​(Vec2 foreDir, Vec2 rearDir, Vec2 foreScaled)
      Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.alignHandles​(Vec3 foreDir, Vec3 rearDir, Vec3 foreScaled)
      Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
      Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.alignHandlesBackward​(Vec2 foreDir, Vec2 rearDir, Vec2 foreScaled)
      Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.alignHandlesBackward​(Vec3 foreDir, Vec3 rearDir, Vec3 foreScaled)
      Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
      Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.alignHandlesForward​(Vec2 rearDir, Vec2 foreDir, Vec2 rearScaled)
      Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.alignHandlesForward​(Vec3 rearDir, Vec3 foreDir, Vec3 rearScaled)
      Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.

      Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandles​(Vec2 temp)
      Mirrors this knot's handles.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.mirrorHandles​(Vec3 temp)
      Mirrors this knot's handles.
      Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandlesBackward​(Vec2 temp)
      Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.mirrorHandlesBackward​(Vec3 temp)
      Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
      Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandlesForward​(Vec2 temp)
      Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
      Curve3.Knot3 Curve3.Knot3.mirrorHandlesForward​(Vec3 temp)
      Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
